General.Name: Aleatica S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Aleatica, S.A.B. de C.V., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design and operation of highways and other mobility assets in Europe and Latin America. It operates 7 toll highways and 1 airport in Mexico; 1 toll highway in Peru, Colombia, Italy, and the United Kingdom; and 3 toll highways in Chile; 2 toll highways, 2 ports, and 1 light rail metro in Spain. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico. Aleatica, S.A.B. de C.V. is a subsidiary of Aleatica S.A.U.
General.Address: Boulevard Manuel Ávila Camacho 5, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 53390
